title: Dogs Love the Smell of Stress
description:
Head to https://shopify.com/scishow to learn more and for a free trial. Thanks to Shopify, a commerce platform that helps you start, grow, and manage your business, for supporting SciShow.

Yeah, your dog knows when you’re stressed out, but did you know they can actually smell it?! And it turns out a pandemic does actually cause shifts in people’s personalities. 

Hosted by: Hank Green (he/him)

SciShow is on TikTok!  Check us out at https://www.tiktok.com/@scishow

title: Why More Isn’t Always Better For DNA
description:
This episode was made in partnership with The Kavli Prize. The Kavli Prize honors scientists for breakthroughs in astrophysics, nanoscience and neuroscience — transforming our understanding of the big, the small, and the complex.To learn more, go to https://www.kavliprize.org/prizes/neuroscience/2022

Sometimes researchers make similar breakthroughs at similar times and that leads to great rivalries (think electricity). But what about the times that these researchers choose to collaborate? 

Hosted by: Hank Green (he/him)

SciShow is on TikTok!  Check us out at https://www.tiktok.com/@scishow
